Screenwriter: Fred Cavayé, Guillaume Lemans, Fred Cavayé
Production Co: LGM Productions, TPS Star, Gaumont, Nexus Factory, Canal+, TF1 Films Production, uFilm, K.R. Productions, Umedia
Synopsis: A man (Gilles Lellouche) finds himself pitted against rival gangsters and trigger-happy police in a deadly race to save the lives of his kidnapped wife and unborn child.
Title: Point Blank
